Package game.ground

Class HigherGround

java.lang.Object
edu.monash.fit2099.engine.positions.Ground
game.ground.HigherGround
All Implemented Interfaces:
Capable, Printable
Direct Known Subclasses:
Pipe, RuinWall, Tree, Wall
public abstract class HigherGround
extends Ground
An abstract class that denotes that a child can be jumped to

  • Field Summary

    Fields
    Modifier and Type Field Description
    protected int fallDamage
    The fall damage taken if the jump to the high ground failed
    protected java.lang.String highGroundName
    A string of the name of the high ground
    protected double successRate
    The success rate of a jump on a given high ground
